trans-unit.source: Event for the Calendar Base extension.
trans-unit.target: Evènement pour l'extension CAL de TYPO3

trans-unit.source: Create events to be displayed on the calendar. Events have a description, location, organizer, and many other fields. Events can occur over a specific time period, last an entire day, or recur at a specified interval.
trans-unit.target: Create events to be displayed on the calendar. Events have a description, location, organizer, and many other fields. Events can occur over a specific time period, last an entire day, or recur at a specified interval.

trans-unit.source: Disables the event so that it is not visible in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Disables the event so that it is not visible in the frontend.

trans-unit.source: tx_cal_event:endtime, tx_cal_event:starttime
trans-unit.target: tx_cal_event:endtime, tx_cal_event:starttime

trans-unit.source: Sets a date at which the event will be visible in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Sets a date at which the event will be visible in the frontend.

trans-unit.source: This field has nothing to do with the actual start time of the event and is only used to determine at what time the event should be made visible.
trans-unit.target: This field has nothing to do with the actual start time of the event and is only used to determine at what time the event should be made visible.

trans-unit.source: tx_cal_event:endtime, tx_cal_event:hidden
trans-unit.target: tx_cal_event:endtime, tx_cal_event:hidden

trans-unit.source: Sets a date at which the category will no longer be visible in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Sets a date at which the category will no longer be visible in the frontend.

trans-unit.source: This field has nothing to do with the actual end time of the event and is only used to determine at what time the event should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: This field has nothing to do with the actual end time of the event and is only used to determine at what time the event should be hidden.

trans-unit.source: tx_cal_event:starttime, tx_cal_event:hidden
trans-unit.target: tx_cal_event:starttime, tx_cal_event:hidden

trans-unit.source: Date the event starts.
trans-unit.target: Date à laquelle l'évènement commence.

trans-unit.source: For recurring events, this field should be the start date for the first instance of the recurring event.
trans-unit.target: For recurring events, this field should be the start date for the first instance of the recurring event.

trans-unit.source: Date the event ends.
trans-unit.target: Date à laquelle l'évènement se termine.

trans-unit.source: For recurring events, this field should be the end date for the first instance of the recurring event, not the last day that the event recurs on.
trans-unit.target: For recurring events, this field should be the end date for the first instance of the recurring event, not the last day that the event recurs on.

trans-unit.source: Time the event starts.
trans-unit.target: Heure à laquelle l'évènement commence.

trans-unit.source: For recurring events, this field should be the start time for the first instance of the recurring event.
trans-unit.target: For recurring events, this field should be the start time for the first instance of the recurring event.

trans-unit.source: Time the event ends.
trans-unit.target: Heure à laquelle l'évènement se termine.

trans-unit.source: For recurring events, this field should be the end time for the first instance of the recurring event.
trans-unit.target: For recurring events, this field should be the end time for the first instance of the recurring event.

trans-unit.source: Title of the event.
trans-unit.target: Titre de l'évènement.

trans-unit.source: Calendar that the event belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Evènement lié à ce calendrier.

trans-unit.source: If you have created multiple Calendar records, you can choose which one you want to associate the event with. The options you've set for the Calendar record will determine which Frontend users will have access to this event.
trans-unit.target: If you have created multiple Calendar records, you can choose which one you want to associate the event with. The options you've set for the Calendar record will determine which Frontend users will have access to this event.

trans-unit.source: Category that the event belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Category that the event belongs to.

trans-unit.source: Choose which Categories, if any, you would like to associate the Event record with. The options you've set for the Category and its associated Calendar record will determine which Frontend users will have access to this event.
trans-unit.target: Choose which Categories, if any, you would like to associate the Event record with. The options you've set for the Category and its associated Calendar record will determine which Frontend users will have access to this event.

trans-unit.source: Organizer of the event.
trans-unit.target: Organisateur de l'évènement.

trans-unit.source: This is the title of the organizer that will be displayed if you do not choose an organizer record.
trans-unit.target: This is the title of the organizer that will be displayed if you do not choose an organizer record.

trans-unit.source: Record for the organizer of the event.
trans-unit.target: Record for the organizer of the event.

trans-unit.source: TYPO3 page with organizer information.
trans-unit.target: Page TYPO3 avec l'information sur l'organisateur.

trans-unit.source: If you have a page with more information about the organizer, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal organizer field and create a link from the organizer field.
trans-unit.target: If you have a page with more information about the organizer, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal organizer field and create a link from the organizer field.

trans-unit.source: URL with organizer information
trans-unit.target: URL avec l'information sur l'organisateur

trans-unit.source: If you have an external URL with more information about the organizer, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal organizer field and create a link from the organizer field.
trans-unit.target: If you have an external URL with more information about the organizer, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal organizer field and create a link from the organizer field.

trans-unit.source: Location of the event.
trans-unit.target: Emplacement de l'évènement.

trans-unit.source: This is the title of the location that will be displayed if you do not choose a location record.
trans-unit.target: This is the title of the location that will be displayed if you do not choose a location record.

trans-unit.source: Record for the location of the event.
trans-unit.target: Record for the location of the event.

trans-unit.source: TYPO3 page with location information.
trans-unit.target: Page TYPO3 avec les informations d'emplacement.

trans-unit.source: If you have a page that has a map, directions, or other information on it about the location, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal Location field and create a link from the Location field.
trans-unit.target: If you have a page that has a map, directions, or other information on it about the location, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal Location field and create a link from the Location field.

trans-unit.source: URL with location information
trans-unit.target: URL with location information

trans-unit.source: If you have an external URL that has a map, directions, or other information on it about the location, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal Location field and create a link from the Location field.
trans-unit.target: If you have an external URL that has a map, directions, or other information on it about the location, you can link to it here. This link will override the Cal Location field and create a link from the Location field.

trans-unit.source: A shortened or plain text version of the event's description.
trans-unit.target: A shortened or plain text version of the event's description.

trans-unit.source: Description of the event.
trans-unit.target: Description of the event.

trans-unit.source: Frequency at which the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Frequency at which the event occurs.

trans-unit.source: Date the recurrence should end.
trans-unit.target: Date the recurrence should end.

trans-unit.source: tx_cal_event:cnt
trans-unit.target: tx_cal_event:cnt

trans-unit.source: Number of times the event should recur before stopping. Note: the actual event is the first occurence.
trans-unit.target: Number of times the event should recur before stopping. Note: the actual event is the first occurence.

trans-unit.source: tx_cal_event:until
trans-unit.target: tx_cal_event:until

trans-unit.source: Defines the interval by day of the week.
trans-unit.target: Définit l'intervalle par jour de la semaine.

trans-unit.source: Defines the interval by day of the month (e.g. 20th)
trans-unit.target: Définit l'intervalle par jour du mois (exemple : 20ème)

trans-unit.source: Defines the interval by month.
trans-unit.target: Définit l'intervalle par mois.

trans-unit.source: Defines the interval at which the event recurs.
trans-unit.target: Définit l'intervalle à chaque fois que l'évènement se produit.

trans-unit.source: An interval of 2 with a frequency of weekly would create an event that recurs every other week.
trans-unit.target: An interval of 2 with a frequency of weekly would create an event that recurs every other week.

trans-unit.source: List of specific recurrence dates in addition to the regular frequency recurrences.
trans-unit.target: List of specific recurrence dates in addition to the regular frequency recurrences.

trans-unit.source: Recurrences can be specified by date, date/time, or an overall period that changes both the start time and the duration of the event.
trans-unit.target: Recurrences can be specified by date, date/time, or an overall period that changes both the start time and the duration of the event.

trans-unit.source: Frontend users and unregisterd users who are monitoring any changes in this event.
trans-unit.target: Frontend users and unregisterd users who are monitoring any changes in this event.

trans-unit.source: Users listed here will receive email notifications about event creation, modification, or delete.
trans-unit.target: Users listed here will receive email notifications about event creation, modification, or delete.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions to describe when this event should not occur.
trans-unit.target: Exceptions to describe when this event should not occur.

trans-unit.source: Exception Events are generally used in conjunction with Recurring Events. Exception Events are days on which you don't want a recurring event scheduled. For instance, skipping a weekly meeting Christmas day.
trans-unit.target: Exception Events are generally used in conjunction with Recurring Events. Exception Events are days on which you don't want a recurring event scheduled. For instance, skipping a weekly meeting Christmas day.

trans-unit.source: Frontend user who created the event.
trans-unit.target: Frontend user who created the event.

trans-unit.source: Frontend group who created the event.
trans-unit.target: Frontend group who created the event.

trans-unit.source: Type of the event.
trans-unit.target: Type de l'évènement

trans-unit.source: The default is Event with Description. You can also select Shortcut to Page or Link to External URL to direct to another page when they click on the Event link in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: The default is Event with Description. You can also select Shortcut to Page or Link to External URL to direct to another page when they click on the Event link in the calendar.

trans-unit.source: Internal page on your site to link to.
trans-unit.target: Internal page on your site to link to.

trans-unit.source: External url to link to.
trans-unit.target: External url to link to.

trans-unit.source: IsTemp
trans-unit.target: IsTemp

trans-unit.source: Upload or select previously uploaded images.
trans-unit.target: Upload or select previously uploaded images.

trans-unit.source: Alternate text shown if images are not found or not supported.
trans-unit.target: Alternate text shown if images are not found or not supported.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple images, alt text entries must be listed on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple images, alt text entries must be listed on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: Tooltip or hover text.
trans-unit.target: Tooltip or hover text.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple images, title text entries must be listed on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple images, title text entries must be listed on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: Adds a caption beneath each image.
trans-unit.target: Adds a caption beneath each image.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple images, captions must be listed on separate lines.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple images, captions must be listed on separate lines.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add a downloadable file, you may upload a file or select a previously uploaded file.
trans-unit.target: If you want to add a downloadable file, you may upload a file or select a previously uploaded file.

trans-unit.source: Adds a caption beneath the files.
trans-unit.target: Adds a caption beneath the files.

trans-unit.source: Frontend users and groups who are allowed to edit this event (in addition to the owner).
trans-unit.target: Frontend users and groups who are allowed to edit this event (in addition to the owner).

trans-unit.source: This option can be viewed and edited in the backend, but the shared user only has access through frontend editing.
trans-unit.target: This option can be viewed and edited in the backend, but the shared user only has access through frontend editing.

trans-unit.source: Current event attendees and their reservation status.
trans-unit.target: Current event attendees and their reservation status.

trans-unit.source: Check this to send out event invitations to all attendees.
trans-unit.target: Check this to send out event invitations to all attendees.
